Title: Defines the terms "impaired" and "intoxication" for the purposes of the vehicle and traffic law
Summary: Defines the terms "impaired" and "intoxication" for the purposes of the vehicle and traffic law.
LawCode: Ren §119-b to be §119-c, add §§119-b & 120-a, amd §1192, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the definitions of the terms "impaired" and "intoxication" for the purposes of such law
